divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my way to my neighbours house (which whom are Mufon members)and I looked directly to the east and I saw an illumanted half oval shape light or you could say it looked like half of a perfect circle that appeared to come from the ground up and dissapeared after a second ot two only to reappear 5 seconds later and stayed the same duration period after that over the course of a one hour period I saw this incident repat itself around 100 times the color pattern varied from extremely bright in the sky white to a real bloody red and various hues inbetween. I did hear that there were some thunderstorms N.E. of me where the lights were but if it was lighting it was nothing like I had ever seen before.
Summary: Strange red lights and oval lights
